mapper.select: select * from BOOKS_CATEGORIES order by books_category_id
mapper.insert: insert into BOOKS_INFO(isbn, book_title, book_writer, book_publisher, book_image_url) values(#{isbn}, #{bookTitle}, #{bookWriter}, #{bookPublisher}, #{bookImageUrl})
mapper.select: select count(*) from BOOKS_INFO where isbn=#{isbn}
select * from BOOK_COMMENT where isbn=#{isbn} and disabled='N' order by insert_datetime
mapper.insert: insert into BOOK_COMMENT(isbn, email, content) values(#{isbn}, #{email}, #{content})
mapper.update: update BOOK_COMMENT set content=#{content}, updated_datetime = now() where comment_id = #{commentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOKMARKS_BOOKS (email, isbn) VALUES (#{email}, #{isbn}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE disabled = IF(disabled = 'N', 'Y', 'N'), bookmark_datetime = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT b.* FROM BOOKS_INFO b JOIN BOOKMARKS_BOOKS fb ON b.isbn = fb.isbn WHERE fb.email = #{email} AND fb.disabled = 'N' ORDER BY fb.bookmark_datetime DESC limit #{skip}, #{size}
select count(*) FROM BOOKS_INFO b JOIN BOOKMARKS_BOOKS fb ON b.isbn = fb.isbn WHERE fb.email = #{email} AND fb.disabled = 'N'

SELECT isbn, book_title as bookTitle, book_writer as bookWriter, book_publisher as bookPublisher, book_image_url as bookImageUrl, book_read_count as bookReadCount FROM BOOKS_INFO WHERE book_read_count > 0 ORDER BY book_read_count DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT isbn, book_title as bookTitle, book_writer as bookWriter, book_publisher as bookPublisher, book_image_url as bookImageUrl FROM BOOKS_INFO WHERE isbn IN ( SELECT DISTINCT isbn FROM DEALS_BOARD WHERE disabled = 'N' ) ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 4
select count(*) from BOOKMARKS_BOOKS where isbn=#{isbn} and email = #{email} and disabled='N'
